comprehensive_overview: OpenSceneGraph (OSG) is an open-source high-performance 3D graphics toolkit that is widely used in the fields of virtual reality, simulation, visualization, and gaming. It provides a powerful scene graph API for rapid development of interactive 3D graphics applications.
core_features: Cross-platform support for Windows, macOS, and Linux
Support for shaders, textures, lighting, and effects
Integration with other libraries like OpenGL, OpenAL, and Qt
Various file format support including OBJ, OSG, FBX, and COLLADA
